red anjou pears

cup

from

Directions
For the Pear Syrup:
Combine pear and water in a pot, bring to a boil and cook until pears have softened and turned slightly translucent, about 6 minutes. Reduce heat to a simmer. Add brown sugar and let simmer 30 minutes. Stir in lemon zest. Let cool 10 minutes, then strain. Syrup can be kept in a sealed container in the refrigerator up to 5 days.
For the Cocktail:
Pour rye, Carpano Antica, pear syrup, and Fernet into a mixing glass. Fill with ice. Stir until well chilled. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with orange twist.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker and strainer, fine-mesh strainer
